Detailed Description

Octant class definition.

Date
10/dec/2015
Authors
Edoardo Lombardi
Marco Cisternino
Copyright
Copyright (C) 2015-2021 OPTIMAD engineering srl. All rights reserved.

Octants are the grid elements of PABLO. In the logical domain octants are squares or cubes, depending on dimension, with size function of their level. Each octant has nodes and faces ordered with Z-order.

The main feature of each octant are:

  • x,y,z : coordinates of the node 0 of the octant;
  • Morton index : classical Morton index defined anly by the coordinates (info about level used additionally for equality operator);
  • marker : refinement marker can assume negative, positive or zero values, wich mean a coarsening, refinement and none adaptation respectively;
  • level : octant level in the octree, zero for the first upper level.
  • balance : flag to fix if the octant has to 2:1 balanced with respect to its face neighbours.

Definition at line 91 of file Octant.hpp.

◆ computeEdgeHalfSizeMortons()

void bitpit::Octant::computeEdgeHalfSizeMortons ( uint8_t  iedge,
const uint8_t(&)  edgeface[12][2],
uint32_t *  nMortons,
std::vector< uint64_t > *  mortons 
) const
protected

Computes Morton index (without level) of "n=sizehf" half-size (or same size if level=maxlevel) possible neighbours of octant throught edge iedge (sizehf=0 if boundary octant)

Parameters
[in]iedgeLocal index of the edge target.
[in]edgefaceLocal edge-face connectivity.
[out]nMortonsnumber of morton numbers.
[out]mortonsare the requestd morton numbers.

◆ computeEdgeVirtualMortons()

void bitpit::Octant::computeEdgeVirtualMortons ( uint8_t  iedge,
uint8_t  maxdepth,
uint8_t  balance_codim,
const uint8_t(&)  edgeface[12][2],
uint32_t *  nMortons,
std::vector< uint64_t > *  mortons 
) const
protected

Computes Morton index (without level) of possible (virtual) neighbours of octant throught iedge. Checks if balanced or not and uses half-size or min-size method (sizeneigh=0 if boundary octant).

Parameters
[in]iedgeLocal index of the edge target.
[in]maxdepthMaximum refinement level currently reached in the octree.
[in]balance_codimMaximum codimension of the entity for 2:1 balancing.
[in]edgefaceLocal edge-face connectivity.
[out]nMortonsnumber of morton numbers.
[out]mortonsare the requestd morton numbers.

[in]ghostLayerNumber defining the layer of the ghost halo. 0 is for internal octants, i.e. non-ghost. ghostLayer > 0 means that the octant is ghost in the ghostLayer layer of the ghost halo.
